amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Defense to inform the Attorney General of persons required to register as sex offenders.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1121, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 161.

action.text: Amendment SA 1121 proposed by Senator Burr. (consideration CR: S2320-2321; text: CR S2320) To require the Secretary of Defense to inform the Attorney General of persons required to register as sex offenders.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1121, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 161.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1121 proposed by Senator Burr.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1121, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 161.
